```{r}
#| label: libraries
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```

# Import

```{r}
#| message: false

segmentation <- read_csv(file = "../000_data/005_data_chapter5.csv") |> 
  select(-c(Segment))
```

# Transform

```{r}
segmentation <- segmentation |> 
  mutate(across(.cols = c(gender,
                          ownHome,
                          subscribe), 
                .fns = \(x) factor(x = x, 
                                   ordered = FALSE))) |> 
  mutate(kids = as.integer(x = kids))
```

# Summary statistics

```{r}
segmentation |> 
  skim()
```
